info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 17 at 6:07AM CDT until June 21 at 11:48AM CDT by NWS Paducah KY
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...
Green River at Paradise.
.Recent heavy rainfall will cause the Green River at Paradise to rise above flood stage later today.
For the Green River...including Paradise...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Green River at Paradise.
* WHEN...From this afternoon to late Saturday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 380.0 feet, Water rises over the skimmer wall at the TVA fossil plant.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 515 AM CDT Tuesday...the stage was 378.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 381.4 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 381.3 feet on 02/08/2010. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE SATURDAY MORNING
